languages.text: "Ценю вашу прямоту, она сэкономит нам много времени. Да, надо кое-что сделать — внести свою лепту в спасение Простора. Ради меньшего я бы не стал тревожить столь почтенную персону".

"I value your directness — it will save us much time. Yes, there is something you must do — it is time for you to play your part to save the Koronus Expanse. I would not disturb your esteemed personage for anything less."
languages.original_text: "Ценю вашу прямоту, она сэкономит нам много времени. Да, надо кое-что сделать — внести свою лепту в спасение Простора. Ради меньшего я бы не стал тревожить столь почтенную персону".

traits.locale_text: "I value your directness — it will save us much time. Yes, there is something you must do — it is time for you to play your part to save the Koronus Expanse. I would not disturb your esteemed personage for anything less."

"I value your directness — it will save us much time. Yes, there is something you must do — it is time for you to play your part to save the Koronus Expanse. I would not disturb your esteemed personage for anything less."

"I value your directness — it will save us much time. Yes, there is something you must do — it is time for you to play your part to save the Koronus Expanse. I would not disturb your esteemed personage for anything less."

"I value your directness — it will save us much time. Yes, there is something you must do — it is time for you to play your part to save the Koronus Expanse. I would not disturb your esteemed personage for anything less."

languages.text: “我很欣赏你的直率，这可以为我们节省很多时间。没错，有些事情必须由你来做。是时候轮到你发挥作用，拯救科罗努斯扩区了。如果不是这么重要的事情，我是绝不会打扰像你这么尊贵的人的。”
languages.original_text: "I value your directness — it will save us much time. Yes, there is something you must do — it is time for you to play your part to save the Koronus Expanse. I would not disturb your esteemed personage for anything less."

traits.locale_text: “我很欣赏你的直率，这可以为我们节省很多时间。没错，有些事情必须由你来做。是时候轮到你发挥作用，拯救科罗努斯扩区了。如果不是这么重要的事情，我是绝不会打扰像你这么尊贵的人的。”

languages.text: «Agradezco su naturaleza directa. Nos ahorrará mucho tiempo. Sí, necesito que haga algo. Es hora de que ejerza sus funciones y ayude a salvar la Extensión de Koronus. No le molestaría por algo de menor calado que eso».
languages.original_text: "I value your directness — it will save us much time. Yes, there is something you must do — it is time for you to play your part to save the Koronus Expanse. I would not disturb your esteemed personage for anything less."

traits.locale_text: «Agradezco su naturaleza directa. Nos ahorrará mucho tiempo. Sí, necesito que haga algo. Es hora de que ejerza sus funciones y ayude a salvar la Extensión de Koronus. No le molestaría por algo de menor calado que eso».

languages.text: 「その遠慮の無さは評価している―時間を大いに節約できるからな。そのとおり、やってもらわねばならぬことがある。コロヌス・エクスパンスを救うために、お前の役割を果たすときが来た。十二分に尊敬できる者の邪魔をするつもりはない」
languages.original_text: "I value your directness — it will save us much time. Yes, there is something you must do — it is time for you to play your part to save the Koronus Expanse. I would not disturb your esteemed personage for anything less."

traits.locale_text: 「その遠慮の無さは評価している―時間を大いに節約できるからな。そのとおり、やってもらわねばならぬことがある。コロヌス・エクスパンスを救うために、お前の役割を果たすときが来た。十二分に尊敬できる者の邪魔をするつもりはない」

languages.text: « Je vous remercie d'aller droit au but, nous n'avons pas de temps à perdre. Oui, j'ai besoin que vous fassiez quelque chose : il est temps pour vous de participer au sauvetage des Étendues de Koronus. Jamais je ne dérangerais une personne de votre rang pour une mission triviale. »
languages.original_text: "I value your directness — it will save us much time. Yes, there is something you must do — it is time for you to play your part to save the Koronus Expanse. I would not disturb your esteemed personage for anything less."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous remercie d'aller droit au but, nous n'avons pas de temps à perdre. Oui, j'ai besoin que vous fassiez quelque chose : il est temps pour vous de participer au sauvetage des Étendues de Koronus. Jamais je ne dérangerais une personne de votre rang pour une mission triviale. »

languages.text: "Ich schätze Eure Direktheit – sie erspart uns viel Zeit. Ja, es gibt da etwas, das Ihr erledigen müsst – es ist Zeit für Euren Beitrag zur Rettung der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Wegen weniger würde ich Eure hochgeschätzte Person nicht behelligen."
languages.original_text: "I value your directness — it will save us much time. Yes, there is something you must do — it is time for you to play your part to save the Koronus Expanse. I would not disturb your esteemed personage for anything less."

traits.locale_text: "Ich schätze Eure Direktheit – sie erspart uns viel Zeit. Ja, es gibt da etwas, das Ihr erledigen müsst – es ist Zeit für Euren Beitrag zur Rettung der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Wegen weniger würde ich Eure hochgeschätzte Person nicht behelligen."

languages.text: "Dobralığın çok kıymetli, vakit kaybetmemize mâni olacaktır. Evet, sana bir görev vereceğim. Koronus Enginliği'ni kurtarmak için yapman gereken şeyler var. Daha önemsiz bir iş için muhterem şahsına rahatsızlık vermezdim zaten."
languages.original_text: "I value your directness — it will save us much time. Yes, there is something you must do — it is time for you to play your part to save the Koronus Expanse. I would not disturb your esteemed personage for anything less."
